term.title: energy gradient

item.text: First derivatives of the total energy with respect to nuclear coordinates, i.e., negative values of forces on the nuclei. Evaluation of energy gradient plays a central role in searching potential energy surfaces for stationary points. A widespread technique is based on the minimization of the gradient norm (the square of energy gradient).
